items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and warm and well made. I like it a lot.
items.body: I love how soft this sweater is and how cozy I feel when i wear it. It is tight knit and wind does not easily through it and that is a real plus for me as I want the warmth. It is well made and feels like it is nice quality--this is not light and thin at all. Very nice. The design is cute and the sleeves were the perfect length for me where most are too long. The cuff part fits really well on my sleeve and is not too tight or loose and goes back into place without stretching out. I can also push up the sleeves too. I like that it hits me about mid thigh for both the look and it makes it warmer. It is also a bit stretchy. I really like this sweater and I only with it had pockets. Read more
items.author: Prime Purchaser

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great fabric, horrible pattern placement!
items.body: I really wanted to love this, and if it actually looked like it does in the display image, I would be giving it 5 stars. As it is, I feel 3 stars is pretty generous. What I do love about it is the fabric itself. It is incredibly soft, and very heavy. The weave is very fine, which makes it quite warm and cozy. It really feels amazing. The sizing runs on the small size, however. I ordered the largest size, 2XL, and although I am by no means a slender gal. The 2XL fits a LOT more snugly than it should, as you can see in my pics of me wearing it. I also think pockets would have been a wonderful addition. The deal-breaker, however, is the deer. The ones in their picture look great. In the sweater I actually received, they look utterly RIDICULOUS! It's like they just literally stretched it out for the larger size! They are totally deformed, AND, the head is buried in the armpit! And this is true of both the front AND the back! In fact, there is not even an entire head showing on either side! You can see in my picture of the side-seam, the two heads(the front and back, literally have their faces overlapping in the seam. All that really shows is is the extremely deformed backend! I personally do not want my bust decorated by the a** end of a deer! Perhaps the smaller sizes do not have this issue, or I just got a really bad one, but because of this design flaw, I can never wear this in public. Such a shame, as everything e,se about it is truly top-notch. Read more
items.author: Kac

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars What in the Christmas hell?
items.body: What is this creature and why is its entire head in my armpit? Cozy sweater that definitely cups your butt, but this creature does NOT look like a reindeer, or moose, or even a yeti. Returning. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars SOFT AND GOOD QUALITY
items.body: This sweater is incredible! It's very soft and really nice quality. I was amazed at how beautiful the design and quality are. It runs a little small; otherwise, I would have given it 5 stars. I ordered my usual size, and unfortunately, I cannot button it. I suggest sizing up one. The black-and-white reindeer design is so festive and cute; I really like it. A cozy, versatile piece that's perfect for parties or family dinners, just plan for that size bump to avoid any snug surprises. Read more
items.author: Tara Topolski

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Reindeer rear ends only showing only! Not a single fully showing reindeer! DO NOT BUY!
items.body: This Womens Christmas Sweater Casual Lightweight Long Sleeve Open Front Cardigan Sweaters in black is not as pictured and has incredibly short sleeves. The reindeer on the sweater do not fully show on ANY part of the sweater like the pictures. The heads are oddly sewn into the side seams and the only consistent part of the reindeers that can be seen is the rear end on both front and back. They obviously were skimping on the sweater material and rather than position the reindeer like the photo or matching up the print on the side seams. There was zer attempt to match up the rest of print. It's a supposedly long sleeve sweater with ridiculously short sleeves (we even ordered up) that depictes only ðŸ¦Œ deer rear parts front and back (as their heads are sewn into the side seams) and horribly noticeable mismatched patterns in both side seams. This sweater is a terrible mess that was pur together in an incredibly sloppy way. WE DO NOT RECCOMEND! THIS SWEATER IS A MESS! DO NOT BUY! Read more
items.author: Lady B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive and Flattering!
items.body: I love this Christmas cardigan! Itâ€™s lightweight but still cozy â€” perfect for layering over tees or tanks. The fit is comfortable and true to size, and the holiday design adds just the right amount of festive cheer without being over the top. Great for work, parties, or just staying cozy at home! Read more
items.author: Sadie Young

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy cardigan wearing
items.body: I was immediately obsessed with this. ðŸ˜ itâ€™s thick and feels like itâ€™ll keep structure. Not bulky or ill fitting. A really comfortable cardigan you can still throw a jacket over. Attaching photo of cuff for thickness reference. The print is great, the fit was as well. 10/10 will be wearing all December. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soooo soft
items.body: Loooove this one. Super soft, the yarn used for it is a thinner softer yarn so itâ€™s small tight stitching. Feels really well made, high quality. Itâ€™s really long, could definitely wear it with leggings. Bit of an oversized fit. So comfortable. Read more
items.author: J Zaleski

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
